title: Available Now! 2 Bedroom Apartments at Modera Old Ivy
posting_body: Move-in ready 2 bed and 2.5 bath homes are available right now.
Ft. square foot home in a friendly community with stunning amenities.
With rents starting at $3,840.00, these homes won't last.
Call us to schedule a tour or get started on an application today!
